value.name: Activists call on San Diego District Attorney to prosecute police abuse after recent deaths
value.description: The Racial Justice Coalition of San Diego held a rally over the weekend to pressure the San Diego County District Attorney to prosecute police abuse or resign.

video.name: Activists call on San Diego District Attorney to prosecute police abuse after recent deaths

value.name: BREAKDOWN – Part II: Law Enforcement And Mental Illness Collide
value.description: He lost his brother in 2019, when Dennis was shot and killed by San Diego Police officers. The aunt of 52-year-old Dennis Carolino called 911, reporting that he was throwing bricks at her.

value.name: Activists call on district attorney to prosecute police abuse
value.description: During the rally, Anthony Carolino spoke about his brother, Dennis Carolino, who was shot and killed by San Diego police in 2019. “My brother’s my number one protector in my life, now I’m ...
